Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Papa \Pa*pa"\, n. [F. papa, L. papa; cf. Gr. ?, ?, a child's word meaning father. Cf. {Pope}.] [1913 Webster] 1. A child's word for father. [1913 Webster]
2. A parish priest in the Greek Church. --Shipley. [1913 Webster]
papa n : an informal term for a father; probably derived from baby talk [syn: {dad}, {dada}, {daddy}, {pa}, {pappa}, {pater}, {pop}]
